documentation.text:
@title AccessControl
 @dev Manages access control policies for IoT data.

devdoc.details: Manages access control policies for IoT data.

checkAccess(address,bytes32).details: Checks if a user has access to a specific device's data.

params.deviceId: The unique identifier of the IoT device.

returns._0: bool True if the user has access, false otherwise.

grantAccess(address,bytes32).details: Grants a user access to a specific IoT device's data.

params.deviceId: The unique identifier of the IoT device.

revokeAccess(address,bytes32).details: Revokes a user's access to a specific IoT device's data.

params.deviceId: The unique identifier of the IoT device.

devdoc.title: AccessControl
